original_text: Then she arose with her daughters in law, that she might return from the country of Moab: for she had heard in the country of Moab how that the Lord had visited his people in giving them bread.
korean_text: 그 여인이 모압 지방에서 여호와께서 자기 백성을 돌보시사 그들에게 양식을 주셨다 함을 듣고 이에 두 며느리와 함께 일어나 모압 지방에서 돌아오려 하여

sentences.original_text: Then she arose with her daughters in law
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그녀는 자신의 며느리들과 함께 일어났습니다

sentences.original_text: that she might return from the country of Moab
for she had heard in the country of Moab
how that the Lord had visited his people
